DataElement.preferredName: Cause of Death Due To Organ Failure Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not cause of death  was due to organ failure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cause of Death Due To Organ Failure Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being._Caused by or resulting from._A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus._A lack of occurrence or performance._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being.

Concepts.definition: The circumstance or condition that results in the death of a living being.

Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or resulting from.:A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.:A lack of occurrence or performance.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.
A lack of occurrence or performance.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
